name: Dojo Blade Hero
description:
A Ninja Appears! Defeat the Ninja!

This game was created for LOWREZJAM 2020. It's a short 1-bit, turn-based battle game where you try to defeat a ninja.

Controls are arrows and space bar.

Play in browser; likely will not work on mobile. Enjoy and comment!
